title: Person of Interest | Bad Guys - Take It All
author: Real Scorsese
comment: Continues Thibault, tu fais un travail intéressant, et la recherche musicale est originale.
Only great actors can play a bad guy that you really loathe. And oh boy, did I despise Simmons. Robert John Burke is a hell of an actor!
There are so many bad guys in this series, but i never truly hated any of them. Well, except samaritan
description:
